lore: Fluxmasters are Heralds of Tzeentch gifted with daemonic Discs as steeds. They streak through the air like scintillating comets, trailing a wake of altered reality behind them in which fate turns in the favour of Tzeentchâ€™s servants and all their endeavours are rendered especially successful and potent.

otherAbilities.Fluxmaster:: While this model is leading a unit, each time an attack is made against that unit, subtract 1 form the Hit roll .
otherAbilities.Altered Reality (Psychic):: Once per battle round , after a Hit roll , a Wound roll or a saving throw is made for this model, you can change the result of that roll to a 6.
